title: So is Riot OCE actually giving OCE codes to OCE streamers for the partnership program?
body:
Or is all this content (Green Infernal Amumu, Sona Emote, etc) all NA-only?

Surely all streamers should be getting codes for all regions because the idea is to get more streamers and more people watching streams regardless of what server they're from, correct?

replies.body: I saw someone in my game with the Sona emote.. So there are OCE partners. I have no idea who though

i know of 2

Cellybeary and Discoheat
Man I kind of want to stream but I am sure it will destroy my ping/performance because OCE internet is terrible....oh and I am boring whatever.

I'm sure you are actually quite a cool individual, just not sure of yourself, what you could do is record a streaming session offline and practice. then review it yourself and with friends.

just be yourself and have fun.
I have decent network and computer, should i start streaming my bronze games?

Why not?

who cares what rank you are, you can still stream and be entertaining.

I'm quite sure riot OCE would consider it, despite what people believe they actually do give a shit about our region.

At a guess their standpoint would be which OCE streamers do they offer this to?

the streamer has to be established, play regularly, have consistent viewers / times and be doing so for over 6-12 months?? 

also not be stream with a blank face and just play without interacting with viewers and talk on team speak with friends.


i can think of 2 streamers who meet this criteria


Cellybeary
Discoheat
